loans.name: Lisalisi Plus Group

texts.en:
“Lisalisi Plus” is a group of 19 owners of small businesses chaired by Marthe. Its members are jointly liable for loans granted by Kiva to grow their businesses.

Marthe sells smoked fish. She has been a micro-entrepreneur for years. She is a hardworking woman who has demonstrated some abilities in business, such as organization and good management. Marte is a loyal client of the MFI HOPE RDC who has already received five different loans and has repaid them correctly. 

Marthe is planning with the next loan to increase the stock of her goods by buying some packages of smoked fish in order to meet the high demand of her customers in her community. Her business brings in a profit of about US$80 per week. She knows how to attract her customers by offering what they need and like. She is also diplomatic when she talks with her clients. Marthe’s medium-term plan is to reach a working capital of $1,500 in order to diversify her business by starting another activity. 

She is 49 years old, single and the mother of five children aged between 18 and 30 years old. One of them attends school.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags and seeds.

loans.name: Katui

texts.en:
Katui is a hardworking 59 year old. She is married and blessed with two children. She has been operating a salon for the last four years. She supplements her income by running a cafeteria. In the next five years, she wants to have expanded her business so that she is able to live out her dream of having a salon in the city centre.

Katui wants a loan of 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a dryer, blow dryer and hair accessories.

loans.use: to buy a dryer, blow dryer and hair accessories.

loans.name: Dora Victoria Muñoz

texts.es:
Dora, tiene 57 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de León, es madre de tres hijos, esta casada , ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, llevar tres años con este negocio. Ella dice que su primera experiencia en el comercio fue cuando tenia una comideria llamada Vicky la cual tuvo por 15 años, después decidió poner una venta de ropa usada que ahora es su actual negocio su esposo e hijos la apoyan a ella en este negocio.
Solicito el préstamo para compras inventario de ropa usada para vender. Con esta inversión quiere mejorar sus ventas, poder vender ropa de mejor calidad para así atraer nuevos clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.  En lo futuro quiere invertir en hacer mejores a su local quiere mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio.
texts.en:
Dora, 57, lives in the city of León.  She is the mother of three children.  She’s married.  She’s a merchant who sells used clothes.  She’s been in business three years.  She says that her first experience in commerce was when she had an eatery called Vicky that she had for 15 years.  She then decided to go into selling used clothes which is her current business.  Her husband and children support her efforts in this business.

She asked for the loan to buy stock merchandise of used clothes to sell.  She wants to use this investment to improve sales, to be able to sell higher quality clothes to attract new customers and improve her income.  In future, she wants to invest in making some improvement in her locale; she wants to improve its infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy used clothes.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a social and industrious 40-year-old businesswoman. She is married and blessed with four children, one of whom is in school.

Mary has been running a cafeteria for a year. She supplements her income from this venture by selling cereals. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 KES to buy potatoes to fry into chips.

Mary’s dream is to own a company and to be a major distributor of cereals. To that end, she wants in the next five years to have opened up a big hotel.

loans.use: to buy potatoes to fry into chips.

loans.name: Irungu

texts.en:
Irungu is a hardworking and determined forty-year-old man. He is married and blessed with two children aged four and two years.

Irungu has been in the metal fabrication business for the last five years. He is requesting a loan of 50,000 KES to buy metal rods.

Irungu is grateful to Faulu Kenya for financing him and for organizing seminars that enable him to interact with other entrepreneurs. He hopes to expand his business within five years.

loans.use: to buy metal rods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics, footwear, treatments, sheets, and general clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lipstick, lip gloss, powder, creams, treatments and shampoo

loans.name: Norman  David

texts.es: Don Norman, de 51 años,  habita en la ciudad de León, tiene tres hijos. Norman es un hombre multifacético pues el realiza varias actividades para ganarse el pan de cada día de manera honrada el es técnico reparación y mantenimiento de refrigeradora, es barbero y comerciante, dueño de una pequeña pulpería la cual tiene en su casa de habitación. Tiene 20 años de ser comerciante pues en los años 80 el tenia un Bar- comideria  tuvo este negocio por 15 años , hace 5 años fue que decidió dedicarse a reparar refrigeradoras, aprender barbería y poner una pequeña pulpería donde vende agua, gaseosas, jugos su esposa e hijos lo ayudan atender el negocio. El requiere el préstamo para invertir en comprar de materiales y equipos de barbería, herramientas para trabajar en  refrigeración e invertir en compra gaseosas y jugos para su pulpería. Con esta inversión espera poder realizar su trabajos de refrigeración mas rápido, tener equipos de trabajos que le permitan trabajar con mas agilidad en su barbería y aumentar el inventario de su pulpería para mejorar sus ingresos. Sus próximas metas son mejorar el local de su barbería, tener una pulpería bien establecida y comprar una moto para trabajar.
texts.en:
Norman, 51, lives in the city of León.  He has three children.  Norman is a multifaceted man because he’s involved in a variety of jobs to earn his daily bread in an honorable way.  He is a refrigeration technician, a barber and a merchant; he owns a small, home-based grocery store.

He’s been a merchant for 20 years because back in the 80s he had a small bar/eatery that he had for 15 years.  Five years ago he decided to go into refrigeration repairs, learn barbering and set up a small grocery store where he sells water, soft drinks and juice.  His wife and children help him tend to the store.

He needs the loan to buy barbering supplies and tools, tools to work in refrigeration and to buy soft drinks and juice for the grocery store.  With this investment he will be able to do the refrigeration jobs more quickly, have work tools that will allow him to work in the barber shop more efficiently and the stock in his grocery store will improve income.  His next goals are to improve the barber shop’s locale, to have a better established grocery store and to buy a motorcycle for work.

loans.use: to buy barber shop supplies, tools for refrigertion repair work and to buy soft drinks and juice for his grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags, footwear, cosmetics, sheets, clothes, and other products

loans.name: Jose Bayardo

texts.es: Jose Bayardo tiene 22 años, su actividad es la venta de granos básicos. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, lo inicio por su papa el cual se dedicaba a vender estos productos de manera ambulante en una camioneta que tenia fue así que el logro obtener sus clientes, fueron el paso del tiempo que decide brindarle la responsabilidad del negocio a su hijo Jose Bayardo. Este es motivo por el cual solicita este crédito para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, maíz entre otros.
texts.en:
José Bayardo is 22 years old and sells basic grains.  He has been in this business for more than three years.  He started his business through his father who also sold these products.  He would sell his products as an itinerant salesman, using a truck that he owned.  This is how he managed to obtain his customers.  Over time, he decided to pass responsibility for the business over to his son José Bayardo. 

José Bayardo is requesting this loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn and other products.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn and other products

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hatice

texts.es: La señora Hatice es enfermera en una clínica de la ciudad. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de una especialización en el área de salud, pues tomará un curso de especialización para ingresar a quirofano (sala de operaciones). La señora vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de tacagua en la ciudad de La Paz, es soltera  y no tiene hijos. Hatice se encuentra muy agradecida con Kiva pues esta será la tercera vez que su préstamo es canalizado a través de Kiva. Ella tiene 45 años de edad.
texts.en:
Hatice is a nurse.  She works in a clinic in the city and needs this loan to pay for a specialization course in the healthcare field.

Hatice lives in her own home which is located in Tacagua district, in the city of La Paz.  She is single and doesn't have any children.  Hatice is very grateful to Kiva as this will be the third time that she has received a loan through Kiva.  She is 45 years old.

loans.use: to cover the cost of a specialization course in the healthcare field

loans.name: Carmelo

texts.es: El señor Carmelo es artesano costurero, tiene un taller en la ciudad de El Alto. Carmelo fabrica cortinas y también es especialista en el colocado de parket en los pisos. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de tela en diversas texturas y colores para continuar su negocio de fabricación de cortinas. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona 21 de septiembre en  la ciudad de El Alto;  es casado y tiene dos hijos. Carmelo es cliente de Impro desde el año  2010.
texts.en:
Señor Carmelo is an artisanal tailor. He has a workshop in the city of El Alto. Carmelo makes curtains and also specializes in the installation of parquet floors. 

The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of cloth in a variety of textures and colors to continue his curtain making business. 

He lives in his own house located in the 21 de Septiembre neighborhood of the city of El Alto. He is married and has two children. Carmelo has be a client of Impro since 2010.

loans.use: to purchase cloth in a variety of textures and colors to make curtains.

loans.name: Bendicta

texts.es: La señora Benedicta es empleada domestica y trabaja con una familia en la zona de Achumani de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción ya que realizara el acabado en obra fina de las gradas de su vivienda. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona 16 de febrero de la ciudad de El Alto, es madre soltera y está a cargo de sus cuatro hijos. Para solventar sus gastos, ella ha alquilado un cuarto de su casa a una persona y recibe un ingreso mensual extra por dicho concepto.
texts.en:
Benedicta is a domestic employee who works for a family in Achumani district, in the city of La Paz.  She needs a loan to buy building supplies in order to finish off some work to her house steps. 

Benedicta lives in her own home, which is located in 16 de Febrero district, in the city of El Alto.  She is a single mother and has four children in her care.  In order to cover her expenses, she rents out a room in her home to a tenant and receives additional monthly income this way.

loans.use: to buy building supplies so that she can finish off some work to her house steps

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco Javier, tiene la edad de 47 años, está en divorciado  y vive solo actualmente. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de materiales y herramientas para fabricar artesanías.  El actualmente cuenta con un pequeño taller donde las elabora y los vende a visitantes que vienen al parque. El quiere con esta compra de herramientas hacer sus labores un poco menos complicadas y darles a sus compradores un mejor acabado a sus artesanías para así tener mayor clientela y que el comprador quede satisfecho de sus obras. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Fracisco Javier is 47 years old. He is divorced and currently lives alone. He expects to purchase materials and tools to make artisan crafts with this loan. He currently has a small workshop where he makes and sells the crafts to visitors who come to the park. 

He wants to make the production process a little less complicated with this purchase of tools and give a better finished craft to his customers in order to obtain a greater clientele and make sure his customers are satisfied with his products.

This is the second loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has never had any other loans from state banks before. However, FUDECOSUR has provided him this loan with great ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools for artisan crafts.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: La señora Sabina tiene 40 años de edad, es casada su esposo se dedica a cargar materiales en volquetes(vehículo de carga pesada), tiene 3 hijos que están en edad escolar, sabina se dedica a vender golosinas gaseosas entre otros en un triciclo de manera ambulatoria,sabina antes trabajaba vendiendo verduras pero decidió trabajar en otro rubro que es la ventas de golosinas con la cual genera mas ingresos, ya tiene trabajando 4 años en esta actividad, el dinero que esta solicitando es para comprar otro triciclo para que uno de sus hijos la apoye vendiendo golosinas y así generar mas ingresos para su familia, sabina tiene mucho sueños uno de ellos es ampliar mas su negocio y en un futuro no muy lejano tener su propio local, sabina esta muy agradecida con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: Sabina is 40 years old and married. Her husband works carrying materials in trucks (heavy cargo vehicles). She has 3 school-aged children. Sabina works selling snacks, soft drinks and other items from a three-wheeled cart as a mobile vendor. Sabina used to work selling vegetables, but she decided to work in another field, selling snacks, which would generate more income for her. She has been working for 4 years in this area, and the funds she is requesting are to buy another three-wheeled cart so that one of her children can help her sell snacks and thus generate more income for the family. Sabina has many dreams, and one of them is to keep expanding her business, and in the not-so-distant future to have her own shop. Sabina is very grateful for the confidence that is being placed in her.

loans.use: to buy another 3-wheeled cart to expand her business.

loans.name: Antonia Deyanira

texts.es: La joven Deyanira, de 25 años de edad, es originaria de la mina Limón una comarca ubicada en Malpaisillo municipio de León, tiene 2 hijos, de oficio comerciante es dueña de una pequeña pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Ella inicio a los 21 años edad con un capital de $300.00 dólares que su esposo le dio para comenzar con la pulpería este ha sido su primer negocio, fue trabajando poco a poco las ganancias que le generaba para invertir de nuevo en la venta , fue haciendo clientes nuevos hasta lograr tener su pulpería como negocio rentable, su esposo aporta en el hogar con el salario que gana como taxista además de ayudarla a ella a atender la venta medio tiempo. Solicita el préstamo para comprar inventario para su venta como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles y productos varios. Con esta inversión quiere mantener surtida la venta para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos. En lo futuro quiere comprar vitrinas para llenarla de nuevos productos para atraer más clientes, comprar un freezer grande para vender jugos, sodas, leche e invertir en mercadería varia para vender.
texts.en:
Young Deyanira, 25, is from La Mina Limón located in Malpaisillo, León.  She has two children and is a merchant; she owns a small, home-based grocery store.  She started at the age of 21 with a capital investment of 300 dollars that her husband gave her to start the business.  This has been her first business.  She’s gradually been working and reinvesting her profits into it.  She’s been acquiring new customers and now her store is profitable.  Her husband contributes the salary he earns as a taxi driver to the household and also helps her tend to the store half time.

She is asking for the loan to buy stock inventory like: rice, sugar, oil, beans and various products.  She wants to use this investment to keep the store well-stocked to meet customer demand and improve income.  In future, she wants to buy display cases to fill with new products to attract more customers, to buy a large freezer to sell juice, soft drinks and milk and to invest in assorted merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es: Carlos Arturo tiene 43 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de transporte. Hace más de 20 años que tiene este negocio, Carlos tiene un hijo a su cargo pues siempre se ha empeñado en sacar adelante a su familia por medio de su trabajo. El crédito que solicito fue para la compra llantas, repuestos, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Carlos Arturo is 43 years old. His business is offering transportation services. He has been at this business for more than 20 years. 

Carlos has one child under his care and has always made an effort to help his family get ahead through his work. 

The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of tires and spare parts among other things.

loans.use: to purchase tires and spare parts among other things.

loans.name: Junielka Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Jinielka tiene 25 años,  posee un hijo menor a su cargo. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y raspaditas, los cuales distribuye de manera ambulante, pues es así que ha obtenido los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia. Ella inicio con este negocio primeramente trabajando con la venta de raspaditas y al mismo tiempo tenía que estudiar, con mucho sacrificio ha logrado todo lo que tiene. Trabaja todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, por lo que diariamente tiene que recorrer diferentes lugares para vender sus prendas de vestir y raspaditas. Ella actualmente está solicitando este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos y trajes. Su sueño, es que a través de las ganancias ofrecidas por el negocio pueda brindarle una educación universitaria a su hijo.
texts.en:
Señora Jinielka is 25 years old and has a young child under her care. Her business is the sale of new clothes and lottery scratch tickets, which she distributes as a street vendor. In this way she has been able to make the necessary income to support her family.   

She began this business working primarily with the sale of lottery scratch tickets while at the same time she had to study. She has gained everything she has through a lot of sacrifice. She works every day from seven in the morning to nine at night. Each day she has to go round to many places to sell her clothing items and lottery scratch tickets. 

She is currently requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of pants, shirts, skirts, dresses and suits. Her dream is that with the profits made through the business she will be able to provide her child with a university education.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, dresses and suits.

loans.name: Noemi Yolanda

texts.en:
Noemi Yolanda lives in the El Paraiso region of Honduras where she runs a small convenience shop. She also earns additional income by milling corn.

Noemi Yolanda is a returning client and has a punctual payment history. She is currently requesting a loan of 10,000 HNL with which to purchase a variety of merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 46 años de edad. Actualmente,  Sonia  vive en la  ciudad del Cusco junto con su único hijo.  Su actividad principal de Sonia es la venta de desayunos, mates, bebidas calientes y frías y otras cosas más, ella tiene un pequeño cafetín donde vende sus productos. Ya son 5 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Sonia  requiere el préstamo para comprar azúcar, panes, pasteles y otras cosas más.

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Sonia was born in the city of Paucartambo (Cusco, Peru) and is 46 years old. Currently, Sonia lives in the city of Cusco together with her only child. Sonia's main activity is selling breakfast, mate [tea], hot and cold drinks, and other items. She has a small cafe where she sells her products. She has operated this business for 5 years, and it is going very well for her, thanks to the dedication she puts into her work. At this time, Sonia needs a loan to buy sugar, bread, cakes and other items. 

The borrower is a responsible and hard-working person, and thanks to these qualities, her fellow members invited her to participate in the “Mosoq Allpa” communal bank of the Arariwa Association.

loans.use: to buy sugar, bread, cakes and other items.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, tiene la edad de 41 años, está casado  y vive con su esposa e hijo que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizarla compra de mas cantidad de verduras para la venta. El cuanta con un carro para la venta de verduras y ya tiene una ruta establecida y lo que el pretende es ofrecerle a sus compradores una mejor cantidad de suministros y mayor variedad. El con esta compra de verduras mejorara su clientela y tendrá mayores ingresos para su bienestar familiar y salir adelante con todas sus responsabilidades como jefe de hogar. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
41-year old Edwin is married and lives with his wife and son who are the most important aspect of his life. With the loan money he plans to buy more vegetables to sell. He has a cart from which he sells the vegetables on an established route, and he hopes to offer his customers a larger quantity and a wider variety of produce. In this way Edwin will increase his customer base and earn more money for his family. As head of the household he will be able to take on more responsibilities.

This is his second loan from Kiva partner Fudecosur. He hasn’t had any loans with national banks in the past, but Fudecosur has offered him a loan with better repayment options and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables

loans.name: Limne Gricelda

texts.en: Limne lives in the El Paraiso region of Honduras where she makes a living by preparing and selling baked goods out of her home. She primarily makes two local favorites—rosquillas and tamales. Limne is a returning client and has a punctual repayment history on her previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 8,000 lempiras with which to purchase ingredients for cooking.

loans.use: to purchase cornmeal, eggs, milk, cheese, chicken, pork, and sugar.

loans.name: Francia Nelia

texts.en: Francia lives in the El Paraiso region of Honduras where she makes a living preparing and selling baked goods to local shops and neighbors. She primarily sells a local favorite called rosquilla. Francia is a returning client with a punctual payment history. She is currently requesting a loan of HNL 5,000 to purchase ingredients for cooking.

loans.use: to purchase cornmeal, eggs, cheese, milk, and sugar.

loans.name: Amigos Unidos Group

texts.en:
Benita is the coordinator of her group Amigos Unidos (United friends) 7. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian clients generally. They are located in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and its sugar cane industry. 

Benita makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and one child. She is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza. She sells clothes, on foot and in her home. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing jeans, blouses, shirts and underwear. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and to buy some electro-domestic appliances. Her long-term goals are to increase her sales and have a clothing store.

Benita is wishing to improve her life and give better opportunities to her family; also, she is planning to  return to Haiti and help her family there. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires, spare parts, light bulbs, and windows

loans.name: Liliana Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña Liliana de 53 años, es originaria de Managua capital de Nicaragua pero vive en la ciudad de León, ella es casada, tiene tres hijos, ella estudio un técnico para asistente de laboratorio. Pero hace 14 años decidió dedicarse al mundo del comercio fue a los 38 años de edad que empezó hacerse comerciante, comenzó vendiendo ropa y zapatos  ambulantes. Hoy en día solo tiene una pequeña vitrina donde muestra sus productos además de los que ella vende ambulante. Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería de ropa, zapatos y joyas de platas para vender, pues quiere vender fuera de León para hacer nuevos clientes, mejorar sus ventas y dar a conocer sus productos en otros departamentos del país como Chinandega donde ella considera que el comercio es bueno para vender. Su meta próxima es poner una tienda de mercadería en general en el mercado central de la ciudad de León y hacer clientes en la ciudad de Chinandega.
texts.en: Liliana, 53, is a native of the Managua, the capital city of Nicaragua, but she lives in the city of Leon.  She is married and has 3 children.  She studied to become a lab assistant, but 14 years ago she decided to devote herself to the world of commerce.  When she was 38, she started working in retail trade, selling clothing and shoes in an itinerant manner.  Today she only has a small glass case where she displays products in addition to those that she sells on the street.  She needs a loan to buy merchandise including clothing, shoes and silver jewelry to sell.  She wants to sell outside of Leon so that she can sell to new customers, improve her sales, and raise awareness of her products in other departments of the country such as Chinandega, where she thinks it would be good place to sell.  Her next goals are to have a general store in the central market of Leon, and to attract new customers in the city of Chinandega.

loans.use: to buy merchandise including clothing, shoes and silver jewelry

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ofelia; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, el prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne y pollos.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Ofelia is a member of the Diamante de Urubamba community bank located in the district and province of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco.

Ofelia is 37 years old and lives with her partner and their five children. As well as her household responsibilities, she runs a restaurant where she makes breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She works from 7am to 6pm. The money she earns helps her family get ahead. She wishes to expand the business and buy ingredients for the food she makes such as rice, meat, and chicken.

Ofelia is happy to receive a loan and promises to repay the money.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as rice, meat, and chicken

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como pollos, cuyes y chanchos y luego los vende en las diferentes lugares como ferias en la ciudad de Cusco, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, ladrillos y yeso para construir su casa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to “El Diamante de Urubamba” community bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district of the Urubamba province, within the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Elizabeth. She is 28 years old, is married and has 2 children. The member alternates her daily activities with her business of raising small livestock like chickens, guinea pigs and pigs. She then sells them to different places like the markets in the city of Cusco. Through this business she is able to help her children get ahead. The member wants to expand her house and finish the construction on it. She is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks and plaster to build her house.

The member is happy about the loan and she is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement, bricks and plaster to build her house.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juliana; ella tiene 60 años de edad y es casada y tiene 9 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara diferentes tipos de platos como chicharrón, pollo al horno y también prepara sopas y cenas, la socia juntamente con su hija trabajan en el restaurant y juntas sacan adelante a su familia, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, papa y verduras.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juliana is a member of the "El Diamante de Urubamba" (The Diamond of Urubamba) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Juliana is 60 years old, married, and has nine children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business.  She prepares different types of dishes such as 'chicharrón' (fried pork rinds) and oven-baked chicken.  She also makes soups and suppers.  Juliana works in the restaurant with her daughter and together they get their family ahead.  Juliana would like to improve and expand her restaurant business.  She is requesting this loan to buy cooking ingredients such as meat, potatoes and vegetables.

Juliana is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as meat, potatoes and vegetables

loans.name: Nelisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nelisa; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganado, ella vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Urubamba, ella por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de ganados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ganado y alimentos para los ganados como pasto.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nelisa is a member of the "El Diamante de Urubamba" (The Diamond of Urubamba) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Nelisa is 24 years old, lives with her partner, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling livestock.  She makes her sales in the different markets in Urubamba district.  Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Nelisa would like to expand her business buying and selling livestock.  She is requesting this loan to buy livestock and feed for them such as fodder.

Nelisa is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed for them such as fodder

loans.name: Rode Maria

texts.es: La señora Rode Maria tiene 32 años, es una mujer casada y tiene 1 hijo el cual aun es menor de edad. Hace más 4 años de dedicarse a una farmacia, ubicada en su casa de habitación. Ella dio inicio a este negocio ante la necesidad que sufría de ingresos para la manutención de su familia en general. Por lo que con todo el esfuerzo logro obtener capital propio, y en parte de su familia que la apoyaron para establecer este negocio. El financiamiento será invertido en la compra de vitaminas, pastillas, jarabes, inyecciones, algodón entre otros.
texts.en: Rode Maria is 32 years old, married, and has one dependent child.  She has been running a pharmacy in her home for more than four years.  She started this business as she needed income to support her family.  With a lot of effort, she managed to obtain her own capital and also received the support of her family in setting up her business.  This loan will be invested in buying vitamins, pills, syrups, injections, cotton wool, etc.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, pills, syrups, injections, cotton wool and other products

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rolando; el socio tiene 30 años de edad, el socio es conviviente, y tiene 2 hijos de 9, 5 años de edad; el socio trabaja en el área de construcción, el socio trabaja desde hace 4 años pero el siempre estuvo realizando diferentes trabajos y de manera independiente; el socio desea ahora comprar para su hogar una cocina de 4 hornillas, el desea poder complacer a su conyugue y de este modo ir poco a poco comprando todos los artefactos necesarios para el hogar. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de una cocina.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rolando, 30, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

He has a spouse and two children who are 9 and 5 years of age.  He works in construction.  He has been working for the last four years but has always worked doing independent construction jobs.  

He wants to buy a four-burner stove to please his wife and gradually buy necessary home appliances.  He is asking for a loan to buy a stove.

He is grateful for the support he’ll get and commits to make his installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Lucho

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Lucho; el socio tiene 38 años de edad, el socio es conviviente, y tiene 1 hijo de 12 años de edad; el socio trabaja en la institución Arariwa en las oficinas de Urubamba, el socio también alterna su trabajo y cuando tiene un tiempo libre el socio se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, el compra animales menores tales como cuyes, chanchos, pollos, cerdos, los cría engorda llegan a la madurez los reproduce y los vende, el socio desea poder aumentar el número de animales que tiene para hacer una pequeña granja y vender al por mayor. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores para la venta.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Lucho, 38, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

He has a spouse and a 12-year-old son.   He works for Asociación Arariwa’s Urubamba office.  He also has another occupation: when he has free time he raises small farm animals.  He buys such animals as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens that he raises and when they reach maturity he breeds them and then sells them.  He’d like to increase the number of animals he has to start a small farm and be a wholesaler.  He is asking for the loan to buy small farm animals to sell.

He is grateful for the support he will be granted and commits to make his installment payments in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy small farm animals to sell.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Dario; el tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de albañil y también es electricista, el trabaja en construcción construyendo diferentes casas, el socio quiere ampliar el trabajo de albañil y seguir mejorando en su trabajo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar maquinaria y herramientas para su trabajo.
                                                 
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Darío, 28, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

He has a spouse.  He alternates his daily chores working as a bricklayer; he’s also an electrician.  He works in construction building houses.  He wants to expand his bricklaying work and continue improving his work.   He is asking for a loan to buy machinery and tools for work.

He is happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy machinery and tools for work.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Walter; el tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de mototaxi,el hace servicio de taxi pero en una moto en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Urubamba, el socio también tiene un negocio de venta de papa y su esposa es la que realiza el negocio y por medio de este negocio y trabajo sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de papa y mejorar el trabajo de mototaxi. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar papas y para el mantenimiento de su moto.
                                                
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Walter, 38, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

He has a spouse and two children.  He alternates his daily activities working with a mototaxi.  He provides taxi services but with a motorcycle throughout Urubamba’s streets.  He also has a business selling potatoes that his wife runs.  Through this business and his work they are able to support their children.  He wants to expand the potato sales and improve the work of the mototaxi.  He is asking for a loan to buy potatoes and to service his motorcycle.

He is happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yolanda; la socia tiene 36 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 3 hijos 13, 9, 7 meses de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista; ella compra al por mayor gaseosas de los diferentes depósitos y también golosinas (caramelos, dulces, galletas, gomas de mascar, piqueos snack) al por mayor que la socia compra de los almacenes para vender al por menor; la socia vende de forma ambulatoria ella tiene una carreta armadas de todos los productos y no tiene un sitio establecido pero casi siempre es en una esquina cerca a un colegio o en una avenida principal, la socia ahora desea invertir el préstamo  en su vivienda, la socia comprara los materiales para hacer los acabados y revestimientos  en su vivienda.  

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 36, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and three children who are 13 and 9 years and 7 months of age.  She is a retailer.  She buys soft drinks at wholesale from the various warehouses and also snacks (candy, caramels, cookies, chewing gum, chips) at wholesale from the various wholesale marts for subsequent resale at retail.

She is a street vendor; she has a cart loaded with all her products and does not have a fixed location but can almost always be found at a corner near a school or on the main street.  She wants to invest the loan in her home.  She will buy the materials and supplies to do the finishing touches and resurfacing on her house.

She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy materials to make home improvements.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras, ella vende tomates, zanahorias, cebollas, lechugas y pepinos, la socia vende las verduras en el mercado desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana, 28, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and a son.  She alternates her daily chores with selling vegetables.  She sells tomatoes, carrots, onions, lettuce and cucumbers.  She sells her vegetables in the market from 7am until 4pm.  Through this business she’s able to support her son.  She wants to expand the vegetable selling business and is asking for a loan to buy vegetables at wholesale.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Florencia; la socia tiene 31 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 2 hijos 6, 3 años de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista; ella compra al por mayor del depósito cervezas y gaseosas, la socia lo llama negocio de venta de bebidas mixtas; el conyugue de la socia trabaja en construcción y ambos desean poder dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y terminar de construir su vivienda. La socia en esta ocasión desea el préstamo  para invertir en la compra de cervezas 5 cajas y de gaseosas 10 cajas variadas, de diferentes marcas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para implementar su negocio.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Florencia, 31, is a member of the “El Diamante de Urubamba” (Urubamba’s Diamond) communal bank located in Urubamba District, Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and two children who are 6 and 3 years of age.  She is a retailer.  She buys beer and soft drinks at wholesale from distributors; she calls it a mixed beverage business.  Her spouse works in construction and they both hope to provide their children with a better quality of life and to finish building their house.

On this occasion she’s asking for a loan to buy five cases of beer and 10 cases of assorted soft drinks of various brands.  She is asking for the loan to buy stock items for her business.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 She is grateful for the help she’ll get and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Senderos Al Exito Group

texts.es: Adela del Carmen es miembro del Banco Comunal Senderos al Exito, tiene 53 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, y junto a su familia reside en una Aldea que se llama Zopilotepe.
texts.en: Adela del Carmen is a member of the “Senderos al Éxito” (Paths to Success) communal bank.  She’s 53 years old, has four children and together with her family lives in a village called Zopilotepe.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Flor De Margarita

texts.es:
Flor De Margarita nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 35 años de edad. Actualmente, Flor De Margarita  vive en la misma ciudad donde nació junto con su único hijo. Su actividad económica principal de Flor De Margarita es la elaboración de artesanía de tipo bordado, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde elabore sus productos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Flor De Margarita requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo hilos, telas y otras cosas más.

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Flor De Margarita was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and is 35 years old.  She currently lives in the same city in which she was born, together with her only child.  Flor de Margarita's main business activity is embroidering handicrafts.  She has a small workshop in her home where she makes her products.  She has been in this business for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

On this occasion, Flor de Margarita needs a loan to buy materials such as threads, fabric and other products.  She is a responsible and hard-working person and, because of these personal qualities, she was invited by her friends to join Asociación Arariwa's "Mosoq Allpa" community bank.

loans.use: to buy materials such as thread, fabric, etc.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha Lorena tiene 45 años. Ella se dedica a la actividad económica de venta de tortillas, frijoles cocidos y café. Hace más de 3 años que se dedica a este negocio, inicio como una alternativa de trabajo, la ubicación de su negocio es en su humilde vivienda por lo que inicio por cuenta propia ya que anteriormente no trabajaba y necesitaba cubrir los gastos de su casa. Es por eso que el propósito de ella es comprar vasos, café, frijoles, maíz, entre otros para invertir un poco en cada producto. Sus deseos son establecer un negocio en el mercado, en donde transitan más clientes.
texts.en:
Martha Lorena is 45 years old.  She sells tortillas, cooked beans and coffee.  She’s been in this business for over three years.  She started out at it  as an alternative job.  Her business is located in her humble abode since she started it on her own because previously she did not work and needed to cover household expenses. 

The purpose of the loan is to buy drinking glasses, coffee, beans and corn, among others to invest a bit in each product.  Her wish is to establish a business in the market where more customers abound.

loans.use: to buy drinking glasses, coffee, beans and corn.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita María nació en la ciudad de Puno (Perú) y tiene 57 años de edad. Actualmente, Margarita María vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco junto con tres hijos. Margarita María es técnica en administración y trabaja en la biblioteca de la Universidad Nacional San Antonio Abad del Cusco. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Margarita María requiere el préstamo para uso personal y específicamente para viajar a la ciudad de Paucartambo. 

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en: Margarita Maria was born in the city of Puno (Peru), and is 57 years old.  Now Margarita Maria lives in the beautiful city of Cusco with her three children.  Margarita Maria has a degree in administration and works in the library of the San Antonio Abad del Cusco National University.  She has been doing this work for 3 years, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time Margarita Maria needs a loan for personal use, specifically, to finance a trip to the city of Paucartambo.  She is a responsible and hardworking person who, because of these qualities, was invited by her friends to join the communal bank "Mosoq Allpa" in the Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to travel to the city of Paucartambo

loans.name: Maritza Del Socorro

texts.es: Maritza Del Socorro tiene 42 años, tiene tres hijos. Su actividad económica de es la venta de ropa usada. Hace más de 6 años que ella decide iniciar este negocio porque no tenía un trabajo estable y necesitaba proporcionarle a su familia el pan de cada día, es así que ella empieza a visitar a sus amigos vecinos y otras personas que le realizaban encargos, hasta que logro establecerse en su vivienda. Ella solicita este financiamiento para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, camisetas y prendas de vestir con tallas mucho más grande pues tiene ciertos pedidos.
texts.en: Maritza Del Socorro is 42 years old; she has three children.  Her economic activity is clothing sales.  She started the business over six years ago because she did not have stable employment and she needed to provide for her family’s daily nutrition.  She, therefore, started visiting friends and neighbors and other people who’d place orders with her until she was able to set herself up at home.  She is asking for the loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, t-shirts and items of clothing in much larger sizes because she has certain pending orders.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits and t-shirts.

loans.name: Jairo Esau

texts.en: Jairo lives in El Paraiso, Honduras, where he has worked in cybercafés for the past two years. Six months ago Jairo opened his own cybercafé and now enjoys a steady clientele. He is requesting a loan of HNL 10,000 to purchase an additional computer since demand has increased since he opened his own cybercafé.

loans.use: to purchase a new computer.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is a hardworking woman living in a rented house in Hioma, Uganda and her dream is to own a house in the next three years. For 4 years, Judith has been running a shop and produce business, having started it with capital of 900,000 UGX earned from her rice harvest. Judith faces a challenge of limited funds to meet her customers' demands. She hopes to have a bigger shop. Judith needs a loan to buy rice, beans, soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, soap and sugar to sell

loans.name: Karla Gabriela

texts.es: Karla Gabriela tiene 35 años. Ella es una joven con un gran espíritu emprendedor. Su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a este humilde negocio. Su ubicación es en su vivienda, en donde ya la conocen ciertos clientes. El financiamiento es para capital de trabajo para la compra de calzado, ropa, perfumes, electrodomésticos  entre otras cosas. Su deseo es proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda para que el día de mañana sus hijos puedan tener algo.
texts.en:
Karla Gabriela is 35 years old.  She’s a young woman with a great enterprising spirit.  Her economic activity is general merchandise sales.  She’s been in his humble business for over 8 years.  It’s located in her home where certain customers already know about her.  

The loan is for working capital, to buy footwear, clothing, perfume and home appliances, among other things.  Her dream is to do some home improvements so that her children can have something some day in the future.

loans.use: to buy footwear, clothing, perfume and home applieances.

loans.name: Deogratias

texts.en:
Deogratias is 36 years old and married, with 4 children aged between 2 and 10 years old. He has no other dependents and lives in a semi-permanent house in Kibaale District, western Uganda.

Deogratias has been operating a store for 5 years and it has enabled him to buy a plot of land and build a semi-permanent house. He faces a challenge of high inflation rates. His desire is to own a wholesale business. Deogratias wants a loan to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: To buy soap and sugar to sell

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en: Leonarda lives in El Paraiso, Honduras, where she makes a living selling clothing and cosmetics. She has run this small business for the past 15 years out of a stall in the central market. Leonarda is requesting a loan of HNL 15,000  to purchase shirts, pants, skirts, dresses, blouses, shoes, sandals, cosmetics, and umbrellas.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, cosmetics and umbrellas

loans.name: Balikyegomba Kikonge Group

texts.en:
Agnes is 29 years old and married with four children aged between eight and one years old. She lives in her own house in Kibaale, Uganda.

For six years Agnes has had a retail shop, the profits from which have allowed her to buy a plot of land. She faces the challenge of high inflation but hopes to grow her business into a wholesale shop.

Agnes intends to use her loan to buy more soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy more soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Tweyambe Hakabanda Group

texts.en:
Anthony is an enterprising 78-year-old man with three children. He lives in his own house in Kibaale, Uganda, with the desire to see all of his children self-reliant.

For 28 years Anthony has been a butcher and from his profits he has been able to pay the school fees for his children. He faces the challenge of defaulters but hopes to expand his business by opening up other branches.

Anthony is a member of a group where by policy each member guarantees the others’ loans. He is requesting a loan to buy cows for slaughter.

loans.use: to buy cows for slaughter.

loans.name: New Horizons Group

texts.en:
Marina, Maria, and Gregoria, all of whom reside in El Paraiso, Honduras, formed the “New Horizons” solidarity group in June, 2011. Marina is married with grown children, and her husband works in the livestock industry. The other group members, Maria and Gregoria, make their livings by selling homemade tortillas and clothing, respectively.

Marina has made a living for many years selling basic grains, dairy products, clothing, and shoes out of her home. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 HNL to purchase shoes and bundles of used American clothing which she will sell out of her home.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and bundles of used American clothing.

loans.name: Tweimukye Nkenda Group

texts.en:
Sirasi is 42 years old and married with eight children between the ages of 9 and 18 years old. He has no other dependents and he owns a semi-permanent house where he lives with 10 people in Karuguuza, Uganda. For five years, Sirasi has been running a retail shop and from it, he has been able to build a commercial house. He faces the challenge of a high inflation rate but hopes to expand his business to wholesale. He needs a loan to buy sugar, salt and soap to sell.

Sirasi is holding a yellow card in the photo.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and soap to sell.

loans.name: Campamento Group

texts.en: Jorge, Norma, and Alis, all of whom reside in Danli, Honduras, formed the “Campamento” solidarity group in June 2011. Jorge has made a living through cultivating vegetables and livestock for the past 50 years. Jorge owns several acres of land where he mainly grows beans and corn. He also raises cattle. Jorge is requesting a loan of LPS. 5,000 to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and pesticide. The other group members, Alis and Norma, make a living though agriculture and selling clothes, respectively.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and pesticide.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es: José Maria tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general.  Jose Maria es un hombre emprendedor, se levanta todos los días temprano pues tiene que abrir su local, que esta ubicado en su vivienda y algunas veces sale a ofrecer sus productos y mostrarselos a sus clientes. El está solicitando este crédito para la compra de uniformes, camisas, faldas, trajes, calzado, cosméticos, toallas, sabanas y pantalones. Este no es el primer crédito que ha realizado, ya que han sido necesarios para su negocio.
texts.en: José Maria has a business selling general merchandise. He is an enterprising man and wakes up early every morning to open his store, which is located in his home. Sometimes he goes out ot sell his products in the street and show his merchandise to potential clients. He is requesting this loan to buy uniforms, shirts, skirts, suits, shoes, cosmetics, towels, bed sheets and pants.  This is not the first loan that he has taken, because he has needed loans for his business.

loans.use: to buy uniforms, shirts, skirts, suits, shoes, cosmetics, towels, bed sheets and pants.

loans.name: Yimmy Geovanny

texts.es:
Yimmy Geovanny  tiene 21 años, Es soltero vive  solo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.

Yimmy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol. Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es mejorar la situación económica para ayudar a los padres que estan enfermos.

Le gusta hacer deporte y estudiar.
texts.en:
Yimmy Geovanny, 21, is single and lives alone in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He has no children.

Members of the “Valle Alto” (High Valley) communal bank are located in Voluntad de Dios in Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming.

Yimmy is a corn, rice and broad bean farmer.  He buys his supplies in Comercial Peña and sells at the Ventanas wholesale market.

He is asking for the loan to plant corn and rice, to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for his crops.  Help from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  His dream is to improve his family’s economic condition.

He enjoys reading and studying.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Edy Patricio

texts.es:
Edy Patricio tiene 35 años, es casado vive con su esposa e hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tienen 2 hijos Wendy de 4 años y Elkin de 2 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Edy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol. Compra sus productos en Comercial López y los vende en el Comercial Peña.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener en 5 años una casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte y conversar.
texts.en:
Edy Patricio is 35 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas canton of Los Rios province.  He has two children: Wendy, who is 4 years old, and Elkin, who is 2.  

The members of the rural communal bank "Valle Alto" are found in Recinto Voluntad de Dios in Ventanas canton.  The members of this group work in short cycle agriculture cultivating corn and rice.

Edy is a farmer who grows corn, rice and beans.  He buys his products in the Lopez market and sells his products in the Peña market.

He requests a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for his corn and rice cultivations.  The support of this loan will help him financially to improve his production and supply him with needed inputs.  His dream is to have his own house in 5 years. 

He enjoys sports and conversation.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Hilda Leopoldina

texts.es:
Hilda Leopoldina  tiene 23 años, es separada vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tienen 2 hijos Gabriela de 8 años y Cristhian de 4 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Hilda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol de palo, cacao y café Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener en 5 años una casa propia y seguir adelante con su familia. Enfrenta el desafío de la cinta roja y la langosta.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Hilda Leopoldina, 23, is separated and lives with her two children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  She has two children: Gabriela, 8, and Christhian, 4.

The members of the “Valle Alto” (High Valley) communal bank are located in Voluntad de Dios, Ventanas Canton and are dedicated to short cycle rice and corn farming. 

Hilda is a corn, rice, pigeon pea, cocoa bean and coffee farmer.  She buys her supplies in Comercial Peña and sells at the Ventanas wholesale market.

She requests the loan to plant rice and corn, to buy supplies and fertilizer for the crops.  Support from the loan will help her economically to improve production and meet her needs.  Her dream is to have a house of her own in five years to continue moving forward with her family.  Two challenges she faces are the plant scourges “cinta roja” and “langosta.”

She enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mario José

texts.es:
Mario José tiene 32 años, es soltero vive con su hija, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijos Magnolia de 5 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Mario se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz,  Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener un auto para ampliar su negocio. Enfrenta el desafío de la sequia.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Mario José, 32, is single and lives with his daughter, Magnolia, 5, in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.  
The members of his communal bank V.R.C. Valle Alto meet in the Voluntad de Dios office in Ventanas canton.  This chapter is dedicated to short cycle crops and they grow corn and rice.

Mario works as a farmer and grows these two crops.  He buys his supplies in the store, Comercial  Peña, and sells them in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for the corn and rice crops.  The support of the financing will help him improve his production and cover his needs.  His dream is to have a car so that he can enlarge his business.  He confronts challenges such as lack of rain.
He likes sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Pedro Darío

texts.es:
Pedro Darío tiene 23 años, es soltero vive con sus hermanos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.  No tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


 Pedro se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz,  Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende sus productos en los comisariatos y tiendas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener una casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Pedro Darío is 23 years old, single, and lives with his siblings in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He doesn't have any children.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Pedro is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in Comercial Peña and sells his products in co-op stores and regular stores.

Pedro is requesting this loan so that he can sow his corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  The support of this loan will help him financially to improve his production and meet his needs.  His dream is to own his own home.

Pedro enjoys taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Bonny Tatiana

texts.es:
Bonny Tatiana tiene 23 años, es soltera vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos Pable de 11años, Kelly de 8 años y Ángel de 4 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.

  
Bonny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz,  Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener un terreno propio para sus hijos. Enfrenta el desafío de la sequia.

Le gusta predicar la palabra de Dios.
texts.en:
Bonny Tatiana is 23 years old, single, and lives with her children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She has three children: 11 year-old Pablo, 8 year-old Kelly and 4 year-old Ángel.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Bonny is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial Peña and sells her products in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Bonny is requesting this loan to sow corn and rice.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops.  The support of this loan will help her financially to improve her production and meet her needs.  Her dream is to own her own plot of land for her children.  One of the challenges she faces is drought.

Bonny likes to preach the word of God.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos Armando  tiene 22 años, es soltero vive con sus padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol y soya, Compra sus productos en Agripac y los vende sus productos en el Ingenio Camacho y el comercial Peña.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, frejol y soya, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y poder ayudar  a sus padres económicamente.  Su sueño es tener su propia auto para mejorar su actividad económica.

Enfrenta el desafío de la cinta roja y la langosta.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Armando, 22, is single and lives with his parents, in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.  
The members of his communal bank V.R.C. Valle Alto meet in the office of Voluntad de Dios in Ventanas canton.  This chapter is dedicated to short cycle crops and they grow corn and rice.

Carlos works as a farmer and grows rice, beans, corn, and soybeans.  He buys his supplies and fertilzers in Agripac and sells them in El Ingenio Camacho and the store, Comercial Peña. 

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for the corn and rice, beans, and soybean crops.  The support of the financing will help him improve his production and also help his parents with expenses.  His dream is to have a car so that he can improve his business.  He confronts problems such as locusts and corn blight.

He likes sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Mirla Maruja

texts.es:
La señora Mirla es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito De Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y tiene 6 hijos.
Solo tres de sus hijos están a su cargo los demás ya tiene su propia familia, su esposo es operador de maquinas pesadas, recién lleva año y medio perteneciendo a este banco comunal.  Ella se dedica a la venta ambulatoria de comida.  Trabaja sola ya que sus hijos estudian por el centro de la ciudad.
Con este préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 balón de gas, un perol, una olla a presión, y lo demás lo invertirá en víveres: ½ saco de arroz, 1 galón de aceite, etc.
Mirla trabaja para ayudar a su esposo y también para sentirse bien, sabe que está poniendo su granito de arena.  Agradece a Manuela por darle la confianza y facilitarle los préstamos.
texts.en:
Señora Mirla is a member of the communal bank "Manos Maravillosas"  (Marvelous Hands) in the District of Calleria, Ucayali Deparment.  She is 40 years old, is married and has 6 children.
Only three of her children are still under her care; the others are grown and have their own families.  Her husband is a heavy machinery operator.  Señora Mirla has belonged to her communal bank for just a year and a half.  She makes her living selling food on the street.  She works alone, since her children go to school in the city center.
With this loan of 1,000.00 nuevos soles ($375 USD), Señora Mirla will purchase: 1 cylinder of gas, a pot and a pressure cooker.  The rest of the money will be invested in supplies:  ½ a sack of rice, 1 gallon of oil, etc.
Mirla works to help her husband and also to feel good.  She knows that she is adding her grain of sand.  Mirla is thankful to her bank for giving her confidence and also for making the loans available.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Maximo Ubense

texts.es: Máximo Ubense tiene 37 años su actividad es una pulpería. Este negocio surgió como su principal fuente de ingresos. El comenzó con una pequeña ventas de caramelos, ha sido con el paso del tiempo que ha salido adelante. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, por lo que han sido de buena ayuda.  Actualmente sigue adelante con este negocio pues es el único medio de vida que posee, pues tiene que cuidar de su hijo. El financiamiento es para invertir en la compra de granos básicos, leches, golosinas, refrescos y jugos.
texts.en: Máximo Ubense is 37 years old and his business is a small grocery.  This business has become his principal source of income.  He started with a small candy store and with time has been able to get ahead.  This is not his first time utilizing a loan, which has been very helpful.  Currently he is continuing with his grocery, as it is his only means of making a living and he has a son to provide for.  This loan is to be invested in the purchase of staple grains, milk, sweets, sodas and juices.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, milk, sweets, soda and juices.

loans.name: Víctor Pascual

texts.es:
Víctor Pascual  tiene 47 años, es casado vive con sus esposa e hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tienen 5  hijos José de 13 años, Jenesis de 10 años, Juan, Jeremías de 7 años y Isaac de 1 año.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


 Víctor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol, Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es llegar a ser ministro en la palabra de Dios. Enfrenta de la sequia.

Le gusta predicar la palabra de Dios.
texts.en:
Víctor Pascual is 47 years old, is married and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, de los Ríos Province.  He has 5 children, 13 year old José, 10 year old Jenesis, 7 year olds Juan and Jeremías and 1 year old Isaac.

The members of V.R.C. VALLE ALTO are located on the premises of Voluntad de Dios in Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank make their living in agriculture, in short cycle farming, like corn and rice.

Víctor makes his living in agriculture.  He plants, corn, rice and beans.  He purchases his products in Peña's Stores and sells his products in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Victor is requesting the loan to plant corn and rice and to purchase supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  The loan will help him financially to improve his production and to supplement his needs.  Victor's dream is to become a minister for the word of God.  He is facing drought.

Victor likes to preach the word of God.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La señora Gladis es socia del banco comunal Las Bellas del Distrito Manantay, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 41 años de edad, en madre soltera y tiene dos hijos.
Desde hace tres ciclos trabaja con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la compra y venta de plátanos, productos que en estos momentos se ha elevado y hay mucha demanda y sobre todo competencia.

Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 comprará 30 racimos de plátano verdes para revenderlos.

Tiene dos hijos que dependen totalmente de su trabajo y por eso trabaja incansablemente, sale a trabajar en la madrugada para poder comprar los plátanos que luego llevara a vender, tiene su puesto que tiene en un mercado de la zona.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad que le ha brindado para poder tener un pequeño capital.
texts.en:
Señora Gladis is a member of the communal bank "Las Bellas" (The Beautiful Ones) in Manantay District, Ucayali Department.  She is 41 years old and a single mother of two children.

Señora Gladis has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for three cycles.  She makes her living buying and selling bananas.  At this time, there are a lot of bananas and a lot of demand, but over all, a lot of competition.
