With this new loan of S/. 1,200.00 (USD $450), Señora Gladis will purchase bunches of green bananas for re-sale.

Señora Gladis has two children who depend wholly on her work.  That is why she works tirelessly.  She leaves for work at dawn to buy the bananas that she will later sell.  She has a stall in a local market.  Señora Gladis is thankful to Manuela Ramos for the opportunity she has been offered to have a little capital.

loans.use: to purchase bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make housing improvements

loans.name: Vianca Vanessa

texts.es:
La señora Vianca es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito De Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 25 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
El tiempo que está en Manuela Ramos le ha permitido hacer crecer su negocio porque todo los préstamos que recibió los ha ido invirtiendo en la implementación de su bodega, que con mucha dedicación ha sabido mantener.
Su espso se dedica  al servicio de mecánica.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 caja de ayudin, 3 tiras de enjuague para ropa, 1 caja de azul para ropa, 1 caja de leche Nestlé chico, 1caja de conservas, 1 bolsa de fideos, 2 cajas de galletas soda, 1 caja de galleta vainilla.
De esta manera su bodega estará más surtida y tendrá más productos que ofrecer a sus vecinos que acuden diariamente a comprar. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los créditos otorgados a su persona.
texts.en:
Vianca is a member of the "La Lupuna" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 25 years old, married, and has one child.

During the time she has been working with Manuela Ramos, Vianca has managed to grow her business.  She has invested all of her loans in stocking her grocery store and has managed to keep it running with a great deal of commitment on her part.

Vianca's husband is a mechanic.

With this new loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles, Vianca will buy one case of Ayudin (a brand of household cleaning products), three lots of laundry wash, one box of Azul-brand laundry wash, one box of Nestle milk, one lot of canned food, one bag of noodles, two boxes of soda crackers and one box of vanilla cookies.  This will enable her to have a better stocked store and more products to sell to her neighbors who come to her store every day to buy from her.  She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans they have given her.

loans.use: to buy detergents, canned goods, noodles, etc.

loans.name: El Firmamento 1, 2 Group

texts.en:
Merki is the coordinator of her group, El Firmamento 1 & 2 (The Firmament). This is a group composed of 10 business women. All of them are working to improve their lives and their families' also. They live in one of the poorest areas around Santo Domingo city.

Merki makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their two children. She is a young mother of 26. She is excited to be seeking her third loan with Esperanza. She successfully paid off her previous loan after using it to make a successful investment in her beans sales. She boils them to sell to her neighbors. (This is a way many women in the Dominican Republic buy beans for daily meals, specially for lunch. They finish cooking the beans.) She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying three bags of beans. 

She is saving her profits because she is planning to expand her business with more products. She dreams of having a grocery store. Her most difficult challenge has been studying and take care of her babies. She likes to work and her future plan is to have her own house. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy beans to boil and sell.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Carlos; el socio tiene 24 años de edad, el socio es conviviente, y tiene 1 hijo de 4 años de edad; el socio se dedica a la atención de su taller de reparación y prestación de servicios mecánicos, el socio entre los servicios que presta vende llantas nuevas, el socio tiene este negocio desde hace 2 años y  desea que siga creciendo e implementarlo poco a poco, el socio ahora desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de llantas para el negocio. 

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Carlos is a member of the "El Diamante de Urubamba" (Diamond of Urubamba) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Carlos is 24 years old, lives with his partner, and has one child who is 4 years old.  He owns an auto repair shop where he provides a range of services including selling new tires.  He has owned this business for two years.  He would like it to continue growing and would like to gradually stock it.  Carlos would like to invest his loan in buying tires for his business.

Carlos is grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy tires

loans.name: Saida Danitza

texts.es:
Saida nació en la ciudad del Cusco(Perú) y tiene 52 años de edad. Actualmente, Saida vive en la misma en la hermosa ciudad donde nació. Saida es secretaria y trabaja en la Universidad Nacional San Antonio Abad del Cusco en la facultad de Medicina. Ya son 30 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Saida requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para viajar. 

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Saida, 52,  was born in Cusco (Peru) and she still lives in this beautiful city.  Saida is a secretary and she works at the National University of San Antonio Abad of Cusco in the department of Medicine.  She has been there for 30 years and she has done well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  Saida is requesting a loan for personal use so that she can travel.

She is a responsible and hardworking person and that is why the other members invited her to join the communal bank the “Mosoq Allpa” of the Arariwa Association.

loans.use: To travel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off previous debt.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL DIAMANTE DE URUBAMBA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urubamba en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Martin; el socio tiene 35 años de edad, el socio es soltero y se dedica a la construcción, el socio trabaja en este negocio desde hace 4 años atrás, el socio tiene su fábrica de bloquetas y el vende a las diferentes obras, el socio en esta ocasión solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de bloquetas al por mayor.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Martin is a member of the "El Diamante de Urubamba" (Diamond of Urubamba) community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Martin is 35 years old, single, and is in the construction business.  He has worked in this business for four years.  Martin has a block factory and sells to different building sites.  On this occasion, he is requesting a loan to invest in buying materials for making blocks wholesale.

Martin is grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy materials for making blocks

loans.name: Jesús Narciso

texts.es: El señor Jesús Narciso vive en la cuida de Managua. Don Jesús se presentó a las oficinas  de Ceprodel para hacer la solicitud de un crédito. Él necesita el crédito para gastos médicos  de su esposa ya que será intervenida quirurgicamente y por ello debe cubrir dichos gastos. El señor Jesús Narciso agradece a ceprodel porque gracias al financiamiento su esposa puede realizarse esa operación que tanto necesita.
texts.en: Jesús Narciso lives in the city of Managua. Jesús came to the office to apply for a loan. He needs the loan to pay for medical expenses for his wife. The money which Ceprodel loaned to him will be used for his wife's operation. Jesús Narciso is grateful to Ceprodel because thanks to this financing, his wife will be able to have this operation, which she needs very much.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses for his wife.

loans.name: Lidia Martha

texts.es:
Lidia nació en la ciudad de Puno (Perú) y tiene 49 años de edad. Actualmente, Lidia  vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Lidia tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Ella vende a sus vecinos diferentes productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Lidia  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, fideos, azúcar, tarros de leche, avena, gelatina, harina y otras cosas más. 

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Lidia was born in the city of Puno (Peru) and is 49 years old.  She currently lives in the beautiful city of Cusco (Peru).  Lidia has a small grocery store in her home.  She sells different basic household products to her neighbors such as rice, sugar, noodles, etc.  She has been in this business for 15 years and is doing very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

On this occasion, Lidia needs the loan to buy merchandise such as rice, noodles, sugar, jars of milk, oats, gelatin, flour, etc.  

Lidia is a responsible and hard-working person who, owing to these personal qualities, was invited by her friends to join Asociación Arariwa's "Mosoq Allpa" community bank.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú), tiene 43 años de edad y tiene cuatros hijos. Actualmente, Ana vive en la misma ciudad donde nació junto con sus hijos. Ana y su esposo tienen  un negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de repuestos en la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado. Su esposo es la persona quien se encarga de la administración del negocio. Ya son cuatro años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que ponen en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Ana requiere el préstamo para comprar repuestos y otra parte será para el pasaje de sus esposo. 

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Ana was born in the city of Cusco (Peru). She is 43 years old and has four children. Currently, Ana lives in the same city where she was born, together with her children. Ana and her husband have a family business which consists of selling spare parts in the city of Puerto Maldonado. Her husband is the one who takes charge of managing the business. They have operated this business for four years, and it is going very well for them thanks to the dedication they put into their work. At this time, Ana needs a loan to buy spare parts, and another portion of the funds will be used for her husband's travel expenses.  

The borrower is a responsible and hard-working person, and thanks to these qualities, her fellow members invited her to participate in the “Mosoq Allpa” communal bank of the Arariwa Association.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, and also to pay for her husband's travel.

loans.name: Dora Clemencia

texts.es:
Dora Clemencia tiene 43 años, es soltera vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 5  hijos Jaime de 20 años, Guillo de 19 años, Carla de 17 años, Lorena de 15 años y Darlin de 9 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


 Dora se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol, Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es seguir adelante con su actividad economía para ayudar a sus hijos en su educación.

Le gusta pasar más tiempo con mis hijos.
texts.en:
Dora Clemencia is 43 years old, single and living with her children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  She has five children: Jaime, 20, Guillo, 19, Carla, 17, Lorena, 15, and Darlin, 9.

The members of the “Valle Alto” (High Valley) communal bank are located in Voluntad de Dios, Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming.

Dora is a corn, rice and broad bean farmer.  She buys her supplies in Comercial Peña and sells at the Ventanas wholesale market.

 She is requesting the loan for her corn and rice crops; she will buy supplies and fertilizer for them.  Support from the loan will help her economically to improve production and meet her needs.  Her dream is to continue with her economic activity to help her children with their education.

She enjoys spending more time with her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for the crops.

loans.name: Damaris Del Socorro

texts.es: Damaris Del Socorro se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 5 años en este negocio.  consiste en ofrecer una gran variedad de productos a sus clientes, sus compras las realiza en donde obtiene sus productos mucho más favorables,  es una persona muy trabajadora y que se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, sobresale por ser un esposa y un madre muy ejemplar y dedicado a su negocio. El crédito lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería como pantalones, bolsos, toallas, sandalias, sabanas, cosméticos y ropa en general. Las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Damaris Del Socorro sells general merchandise.  She’s been in business five years.  It consists in offering a great variety to her customers.  She makes her purchases wherever she gets the most favorable prices.  She’s a very hard working person who is concerned for her family’s wellbeing.  She stands out for being an exemplary wife and mother who is dedicated to her business.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise like: pants, purses, towels, sandals, sheets, cosmetics and clothing in general.  She needs the profits to cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy purses, towels, sandals, sheets, cosmetics and clothing in general.

loans.name: Maryuri Mariuxi

texts.es:
Maryuri Mariuxi tiene 21 años, es soltera vive con su hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo Josué de 2 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Maryuri se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar una moto para desarrollar su actividad economía. Enfrenta el desafío de la sequia.

Le gusta predicar la palabra de Dios.
texts.en:
Maryuri Mariuxi is 21 years old, single and living with her son in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.   She has a two-year-old son, Josué.

The members of the “Valle Alto” (High Valley) communal bank are located in Voluntad de Dios, Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming activities.

Maryuri is a corn and rice farmer.  She buys her supplies at Comercial Peña and her sales take place at the Ventanas wholesale market.

She is requesting the loan for her corn and rice crops; she will buy farming supplies and fertilizers for them.  Support from the loan will help her economically to improve production and meet her needs.  Her dream is to buy a motorcycle to carry out her economic activity.  The challenge she faces is the drought.

She enjoys preaching the word of God.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for the crops.

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor Manuel tiene 38 años, es soltero  vive con su hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija Katherine de 13 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Víctor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para su hijo. Enfrenta el desafío de la sequia.

Le gusta trabajar y practicar deporte.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel is 38 years old. He is single and lives with his child in the Ventanas canton in Provincia de los Ríos. He has one 13-year-old daughter.

The V.R.C. Valle Alto [Valle Alto community bank] is located in the Voluntad de Dios precinct of the Ventanas canton. This community bank is devoted to short cycle maize and rice growing agricultural works. 

Victor makes his living in agriculture, growing maize and rice. He buys his products in the Peña Store and sells his products at the Ventanas wholesale market.

He is requesting the loan to plant maize and rice, purchasing supplies and fertilizers for the crops. The support from this loan would help him economically to improve his production and supplement his needs. His dream is to buy a plot of land for his child. He faces the challenges of drought. 

He likes to work and play sports.

loans.use: tpo buy supplies and fertilizers fro his crops.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal Las Tesoritos del Distrito de Yarinacocha. Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de lubricantes y repuestos de motos, recién lleva cuatro ciclos trabajando con este banco comunal.  Los préstamos solicitados le han servido para ir implementando cada día su negocio, el cual se encuentra ubicado en una calle muy transitada.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 caja de lubricante, 1 docena de cámara para moto, 1 caja de rodaje, 6 catalinas, 6 cadenas, 6 intermitentes, 1 caja de grasa, 1 caja de sera.
Estos productos no tienen que faltar en este negocio ya que tienen mucha demanda.  Su negocio está instalado en su propia casa, su hija es la que se queda a cargo de todo cuando Rosa sale a realizar algunas compras.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos, que por medio de sus promotoras, le están dando las pautas de ¿cómo manejar adecuadamente su dinero?.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “Las Tesoritos del Distrito de Yarinacocha” (Treasures of Yarinacocha District) communal bank, Ucayali Department.  She’s 42 years old, married and has two children.

She sells lubricants and motorcycle spare parts.  She’s just been working with the communal bank for four cycles.  The requested loans have served to stock the business, which is located on a very busy street, every day.

With her new, 1700 new sol, loan she will buy: 1 box of lubricants, 1 dozen motorcycle inner tubes, 1 box of ball bearings, 6 gears, 6 chains, 6 turn signals, 1 box of grease and 1 box of wax. These products can’t be lacking in this business because they are in very high demand.  Her business is located in her house and her daughter takes charge of everything whenever Rosa has to go out shopping.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos because she is getting guidance through its advisors on such topics like: how to adequately manage her money.

loans.use: to buy wax, grease and lubricants.

loans.name: Gina

texts.es:
Gina nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú), tiene 31 años de edad y tiene un hijo. Actualmente,  Gina  vive en la misma ciudad donde nació junto con su hijo.  Gina  y su esposo tienen  un negocio familiar que cosiste en hacer mantenimientos de carros, ella en el taller desempeña la labor administrativa como hacer documentos, licitaciones, cotizaciones, compras y otras cosas más. Su esposo es la persona que se encarga de la administración del negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que ponen en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad  Gina requiere el préstamo para comprar herramientas y respuestos como por ejemplo llaves, aceites, lubricantes, grasa, tuercas y otras cosas más.

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Gina was born in the city of Cusco (Perú).  She is 31 years old and has a son.  Gina currently lives in the same city she was born in with her son.  Gina and her husband have a family business consisting in providing car maintenance.  She carries out the administrative tasks in the shop like documentation, negotiations, pricing, purchasing and other things.  Her husband runs the business.  

They’ve been in this business for several years now and they do quite well thanks to the effort they put into their work.  On this occasion, Gina wants the loan to buy tools and spare parts like: wrenches, oil, lubricant, grease, nuts and other things.


She is a responsible, hard working person who was invited by her fellow members to join Asociación Arariwa’s “Mosoq Alllpa” communal bank because of that.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena  tiene 38 años, es separada vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tienen 4 hijos José de22 años y Estefani de 21 años, Mayor de 18 años y angie de 12 años.


Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol de palo y cacao, Compra sus productos en Agripac y vende sus productos en el comercial Peña.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, frejol, frejol de palo y cacao, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es comprar una casa para sus hijos.

Le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is 38 years old, separated and living with her children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  She has four children: José, 22, Estefani, 21, Mayor, 18 and Angie, 12.  

The members of the “Valle Alto” (High Valley) communal bank are located in Voluntad de Dios, Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming chores.

María is a corn, rice, pigeon pea and cocoa bean farmer.  She buys her supplies at Agripac and sells her products at Comercial Peña.

She requests the loan for her corn, rice, broad bean, pigeon pea and cocoa bean crops; she will buy supplies and fertilizer for them.  Support from the loan will help her improve economically and improve her production.  Her dream is to buy a house for her children.

She likes to cook.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer for the crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a computer.

loans.name: Livingston Javier

texts.es:
Livingston Javier tiene 22 años, es soltero vive solo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Livingston  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende sus productos en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para mejorar su producción  y suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es seguir adelante en su actividad económica. 

Le gusta  practicar deporte y ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Livingston Javier is 22 years old. He is single and lives alone in the Ventanas canton in the province De Los Rios. He has no children.

The communal bank Valle Alto is located in the Voluntad de Dios district in the Ventanas canton. This communal bank provides short term loans for agricultural borrowers who plant corn and rice.

Livingston works in agriculture, planting corn and rice. He buys his supplies at the Peña commercial center and sells his products in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is applying for the loan to plant corn and rice, to buy the supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The loan will help him economically so that he can improve his production and supply his needs. His dream is to advance in his economic activity.

He likes to play sports and watch television.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Milton José

texts.es:
El señor Milton José  vive en la ciudad de Managua Nicaragua trabaja en la misma cuidad.
Don Milton  visito nuestra oficina para solicitar crédito ya que necesita el dinero para hacerles mejoras a la  vivienda.
El préstamo lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción como arena, piedra, bloque, cemento
Y el pago de mano de obra.
Don José  agrádese a ceprodel por los créditos obtenido
texts.en: Milton José lives in the city of Managua, Nicaragua, and works in the same city. Milton visited the office to request a loan, since he needs the money to make improvements to his home. He will invest the funds from the loan in buying construction materials such as sand, stone, concrete blocks and cement, and paying for labor.  Milton José is grateful to Ceprodel for the loans he has obtained.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Glenda Yadira

texts.es:
Glenda Yadira tiene 32 años, es separada vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos Andover de 17 años y Wendy de 8 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Glenda  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y soya,  Compra y vende sus productos en el Comercial Peña.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es comprar una cuadra de terreno y construir su propia casa. El desafio que enfrenta es la langosta patera 

Le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Glenda Yadira is 32 years old. She is separated and lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas, in Los Ríos province. She has 2 children: Andover, age 17, and Wendy, age 8.

The Valle Alto communal bank is located in the Voluntad de Dios neighborhood of the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, planting corn and rice. 

Glenda works in agriculture, planting corn, rice and soy. She buys supplies and sells her products at the Peña commercial center.

She is requesting this loan to plant corn and rice; she will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops. The loan will help her get ahead economically and improve her production. Her dream is to buy a plot of land and build her own house. The main challenge she faces is "langosta patera" [plant disease].  

She enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Angela Lastenia

texts.es:
Angela Lastenia  tiene 27 años, es soltera vive con su familia, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo Jhair de 9 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.

Angela  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y soya,  Compra sus productos en el Comercial Salomón y vendes sus productos en los comisariatos y tiendas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es comprarse su propio terreno.  

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Angela Lastenia is 27 years old. She is single and lives with her family in the canton of Ventanas, in Los Rios province. She has 1 child, Jhair, who is 9 years old.

The VALLE ALTO communal bank is located in the Voluntad de Dios neighborhood in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice. 

Angela works in agriculture, growing corn, rice and soybeans. She buys her supplies at the Salomón commercial center and sells her products at the markets and stores.

She is requesting this loan to plant corn and rice; she will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops. The loan will help her get ahead economically and improve her production. Her dream is to buy her own plot of land. 

She enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú), tiene 51 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene un hijo. Actualmente, Gabriela vive en la misma ciudad donde nació junto con su hijo y su pareja. Gabriela es secretaria y trabaja en el área administración de una universidad. Ya son 33 años que se dedica a este trabajo y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su Labor. En esta oportunidad Gabriela requiere el préstamo para uso personal y desea para la educación de su hijo osea para pagar su matricula del colegio.   

La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Mosoq Allpa” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Gabriela was born in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She is 51 years old, married, and has one child.  Gabriela currently lives in the same city where she was born along with her son and her partner.  She works in administration as a secretary at a university.  Gabriela has been employed for 33 years and has done very well in her job.  

She is taking this opportunity to request a loan for personal use.  Gabriela wants to provide for her child’s education.  

She is a responsible and hardworking individual.  It is because of these qualities that her fellow group members invited her to participate in the “Mosoq Allpa” Communal Bank, which is part of Asociación Araiwa.

loans.use: to pay for her child's tuition

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel  tiene 21 años, es soltero vive con sus padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


José  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y gandul,  Compra y vende sus productos en el Comercial Peña.

Solicita el crédito para la adquisición de un chancho y comprar de insumos para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es ayudar a su familia.  

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. He does not have children.

The members of the Communal Bank “Valle Alto” meet in the neighborhood of Voluntad de Dios in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

José is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. He buys and sells his products at the Peña Commercial Center.

He is requesting a loan to acquire a pig and to buy supplies for his crops. With the support of this loan, he will be able to excel financially and improve his production. His dream is to help his family.

José enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to acquire a pig and to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto tiene 31 años, es soltero vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos Katiuska de 9 años y Luis de 7 años.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Luis  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol,  Compra sus productos en el Comercial Peña y vende en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, frejol y cacao,  compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es comprar una finca pequeña.

Le gusta conversar.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 31 years old, single, and lives with his children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. He has two children, Katiuska (age 9) and Luis (age 7).

The members of the Communal Bank “Valle Alto” meet in the neighborhood of Voluntad de Dios in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Luis is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. He buys his products at the Peña Commericial Center and sells at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for growing corn, rice, beans, and cacao, as well as fertilizers for these crops. With the support of this loan, he will be able to excel financially and improve his production. His dream is to buy a small farm.

Luis enjoys making conversation.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Gladys Azucena

texts.es:
Gladys Azucena  tiene 38 años, es soltera vive con sus hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tienen 2 hijos Luis de 8 años y Valeria de 6 meses.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz y arroz.


Gladys se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, Compra sus productos en Agripac y vende en el mercado mayorista de ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, frejol, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría a superarse económicamente y  mejorar su producción. Su sueño es comprar una casa para sus hijos.

Le gusta conversar.
texts.en:
Gladys Azucena is 38 years old, single, and lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. She has two children, Luis (age 8) and Valeria (age 6 months).

The members of the Communal Bank “Valle Alto” meet in the neighborhood of Voluntad de Dios in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Gladys is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. She will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops. With the support of this loan, she will be able to excel financially and improve her production. Her dream is to buy a house for her children.

Gladys enjoys making conversation.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: El Eden Group

texts.es: Emprendedor y luchador, son las cualidades del señor Juan Miguel D. 40 años D. edad, que pertenece a la Añcancia comunal "El Edén"  y conformado por nueve integrantes, son personas  inteligentes que  están emprendiendo negocios que están cambiando nuestro entorno laboral. El tiene una librería llamada El Buen Pastor que es su negocio a diario,  los ingresos económicos D. estas ventas le han generado gratas satisfacciones, como  lograr pagar los estudios D. sus dos hijos y completar sus necesidades en casa, también trabaja como Técnico Electrónico en sus ratos libres, con el reciente préstamo  piensa invertir en la compra D. útiles escolares e implementar su negocio con nuevos novedades.
texts.en:
Enterprising and determined are qualities that describe Sr. Juan Miguel.  He is 40 years old and part of the group “El Eden”, which consists of nine members.  They are intelligent people who started their own businesses and are changing their work environment.  Juan Miguel has a bookstore called “El Buen Pastor” (The Good Shepherd) that he manages every day.  The income he generates from his sales has been satisfactory and allows him to pay for the education of his two children and the household necessities.  Juan Miguel also works as an electronics technician in his spare time.  

With this recent loan, he will buy school supplies and new novelty products to keep his business in operation.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and novelty items to add to his inventory.

loans.name: Edwin Jonathan

texts.es:
Edwin Jonathan tiene 20 años, Es soltero vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, por la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembren maíz y arroz.

Edwin se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Sin Rival y Comercial Suarez y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como las enfermedades en los cultivos.Su sueño es comprar un solar y una casa.

Le gusta hacer mucho deporte.
texts.en:
Edwin Jonathan is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. He does not have children.

The members of the San Jacinto Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in Guare Parish, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Edwin is a farmer who grows corn and rice. He buys his products at the Sin Rival and Suarez Commercial Centers, and then sells his products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies for growing corn and rice, as well as fertilizers for his crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his crops. His dream is to buy a piece of land and a house.

Edwin greatly enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Paulino José

texts.es:
Paulino José trabaja en la ciudad de Managua como tornero industrial.
Es padre de familia de un hijo y este se encuentra en edad escolar.
El acude a las oficinas para solicitar un préstamo para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, el va utilizar el dinero para la compra de materiales de construcción, para continuar el procesa progresivo del mejoramiento de su vivienda.
A gradece a ceprodel por brindarle la oportunidad  de tener una vivienda digna para sus familia.
texts.en:
Paulino José works in the city of Managua as an industrial lathe operator. He is the father of a child who is in school. Paulino came to the offices of CEPRODEL to request a home improvement loan. He plans to use the money to buy construction materials so that he can continue the process of making gradual improvements to his home.

He is grateful to CEPRODEL for providing the opportunity for his family to have a decent home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a computer so that she can perform the bookkeeping for her bakery business.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria De Los Ángeles tiene 33 años, por lo que su actividad económica es una pulpería. Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella ofrece todo tipo de productos de consumo diarios, Maria tiene 3 hijos de 12,6 y2 años ella se hace cargo de ellos, por lo que se preocupa por brindarles la oportunidad de estudiar. El financiamiento que solicitan es para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, juegos, pan y sopas. Sueña con incrementar su inventario para su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria De Los Ángeles is 33 years old and manages a store. She has been in business for more than four years and offers all types of daily consumer products. Maria has three children (ages 12, 6, and 2) for whom she is responsible. She is concerned about providing them the opportunity to study.

The loan she is requesting will be used as operating capital for purchasing basic grains, detergents, candy, juices, bread, and soups. Her dream is to increase the inventory of her business.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, detergents, candy, juices, bread, and soups.

loans.name: Carlos Vinicio

texts.es:
Carlos Vinicio tiene 31 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, por la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembren maíz y arroz.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Sin Rival y Comercial Suarez y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como plagas en los cultivos.Su sueño es tener una casa propia y vivir con la familia y tener lo necesario.

En los tiempos libre le gusta hacer deporte, saludar con los vecinos.
texts.en:
Carlos Vinicio is 31 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. He has three children.

The members of the San Jacinto Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in Guare Parish, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Carlos is a farmer who grows corn and rice. He buys his products at the Sin Rival and Suarez Commercial Centers, and then sells his products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies for growing corn and rice, as well as fertilizers. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his crops. His dreams are to live with his family in their own house and to have everything they need.

In his free time, Carlos enjoys playing sports and greeting his neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a lap-top computer.

loans.name: Livy

texts.es:
La señora Livy es socia del banco comunal Las tesoritos del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 26 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Son cuatro ciclos que lleva trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comida, tiene un pequeño local, a donde tiene que llevar a su pequeño hijo porque no tiene con quien dejarlo, trabaja todo el día, solo regresa a su casa para descansar.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprará: ½ saco de arroz, ½ saco de azúcar, 1 bolsa de fideos, menestras, 1 galón de aceite, vinagre, sillao.
Estos productos son muy indispensables en la elaboración de sus comidas, es un trabajo agotador pero de esta forma ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. El es chofer de moto car (transporte).
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por ser parte de sus sueños, quiere seguir trabajando y mejorar la vida de su hijo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Livy is a member of the communal bank "Las Tesoritos" in the district of Yarinacocha in the department of Ucayali.  She is 26, married and has a son.

For four cycles she has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos.  She has a food business in a small stall and takes her son with her to work because she has no one to leave him with.  She works all day and only returns home to sleep.

With the new loan of 1,700 PEN she will buy 1/2 sack of rics, 1/2 sack of sugar, 1 bag of pasta, vegetable soups, 1 gallon of oil, vinegar and soy sauce.  These products are necessary for her food preparation.  Her work is very tiring but it allows her to help her husband with the household expenses.  He has a motor-car (transportation) service.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for being part of her dream.  She wants to continue working to improve her son's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sweets, softdrinks, bread, cookies and basic grains.

loans.name: Elizabeth Esther

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth Esther es socia del banco comunal Las tesoritas del Distrito De Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.
Hace 2 años que viene trabajando con Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, tiene dos hijos que todavía están a su cargo y a los cuales les paga los estudios, su esposo es maestro constructor.  Tienen que trabajar los dos para poder cubrir todos los gastos del hogar.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: hará el pago por productos de belleza que sacó a crédito y con la otra parte del dinero cubrirá otro pedido el cual tendré para su stock.
Es poco el tiempo que trabaja con estos productos pero ya tiene un pequeño capital, que lo hará crecer poco a poco, todo lo que tiene hasta ahora es gracias a su esfuerzo y a la oportunidad que Manuela Ramos le dió.
texts.en:
Mrs. Elizabeth Esther is a member of the communal bank "Las Tesoritas" in the district of Yarinacocha, in the department of Ucayali.  She is 40, married and has three children.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for two years and sells beauty products by catalogue.  She has two children still in her care and for whom she covers education expenses.  Her husband is a master builder.  Both of them have to work in order to cover household expenses.

The new loan in the amount of 2,200 PEN will be used to buy beauty products that she ordered on credit.  The other part of the loan will be used to buy inventory.

She hasn't been working long but already has a small amount of capital which she wants to increase little by little.  Everything she currently has is thanks to her efforts and the opportunity given to her by Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: To buy beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Gregoria Adelaida

texts.es: Gregoria es viuda y tiene 4 hijos 2 mayores de edad y 2 menores que están bajo su cargo. La señora comenzó su negocio hace 8 años, cuando su esposo falleció y tenia conocimientos del trabajo como es brindar el servicio de costura. La mayoría de sus clientes saben que ella ofrece una buena calidad en sus prendas y así obtiene mucho más clientes. Este nuevo crédito lo va a emplear en comprar telas, tijeras, agujas, hilos, cinta métrica y alfileres. Sus metas son agrandar su negocio y brindar una amplia variedad de prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Gregoria is a widow and has four children. Two are grown and two are younger and under her care. She started her business when her husband died eight years ago, as she had some knowledge of how to offer sewing services. The majority of her customers know that she offers good quality garments and this is how she obtains many of her customers. She will use this new loan to buy fabric, scissors, needles, thread, a tape measure, and pins. Her goals are to expand her business and to offer a greater variety of garments.

loans.use: to buy fabric, scissors, needles, thread, a tape measure, and pins

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
La señora Ysabel es socia del banco comunal Las Guerreras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, los préstamos que generalmente saca lo invierte en la compra de sus productos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: una vitrina, 4 colonias, 2 desodorantes, 1 crema de afeitar, 1 talco para pies, 1 crema para el cuerpo, 1 champú, 2 lápiz delineadores, 3 lápiz labial, 2 polvos compactos.
Su esposo trabaja en una compañía de la zona, Ysabel lo ayuda con los gastos vendiendo estos productos ya que no le demanda mucho tiempo y lo mejor  de todo es que es el fruto de su esfuerzo.
Ysabel agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad de poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ms. Ysabel is a member of the "Las Guerreras" ["The Warriors"] communal bank in the district of Calleria, Ucayali department. She is 27 years old, married, and has one son.

She sells beauty products by catalog. The loans she takes out are generally used to invest in purchasing her products. With her new loan of 2,000 nuevos soles, she will buy: a display case, four colognes, two deodorants, one shaving cream, one foot powder, one body cream, one shampoo, two eyeliner pencils, three lipliner pencils, and two powder compacts.

Her husband works in a local company. Ysabel helps with the household expenses by selling these products. It doesn't demand much time and best of all, it is the fruit of her efforts.

Ysabel thanks Manuela Ramos for this opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a display case, colognes, creams, etc.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
La señora Olga es socia del banco comunal Las Trabajadoras De Manantay del Distrito De calleria, Departamento De Ucayali.
Se dedica a la venta de condimentos embolsados, los cuales repartes en las bodegas de la zona, viene  trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace dos años.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará 3 kilos de comino, 3 kilos de pimienta, 2 kilos de orégano, 2 kilos de guisador, 2 kilos de canela, 2 kilos de anís, 2 kilos de clavo de olor, 1 ciento de cartulina, pegamento, bolsa en tira.
Es un trabajo que no le quita mucho tiempo y que le genera unos ingresos extras a su hogar, para poder comprar algunas cosas que le hacen falta, y también para poder darles a sus hijos las cosas que les piden en la escuela.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the "Las Trabajadoras de Manantay" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.

Olga sells packaged spices which she distributes to grocery stores in her area.  She has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for two years.

Olga will use this loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles to buy 3 kilos of cumin, 3 kilos of pepper, 2 kilos of oregano, 2 kilos of turmeric, 2 kilos of cinnamon, 2 kilos of aniseed, 2 kilos of cloves, 100 lots of card, glue and bags in strips.

This work does not take up much of Olga's time and it makes her some extra income for her household so that she can buy some things that they lack and also provide her children with things they need for school.  She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy cumin seeds and other whole herbs and spices

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Las Natividades” de la Asociación Arariwa.

La socia nació en la ciudad de Huarocondo  (provincia de Anta, departamento del Cusco, Perú) y tiene 34 años de edad, ella está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos. Las edades de sus hijos de la socia son de 10 años, 8 años, 3 años y de 3 meses de nacido y permanecen en su lado todos. 

Actualmente, la socia vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales como chanchos  y también se dedica a preparación del plato típico que se llama Chicharrón. Ella vende su comida en la feria de Inquilapata de la provincia de Anta, en las fiestas patronales y en otras ferias.  

Otra actividad que desarrolla la socia es la compra y venta de maíz. Desde los 8 años la socia se dedica a los negocios pues acompañaba a sus padres pero ahora que es mayor tiene que velar por el bienestar de su familia. En esta oportunidad, la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar chanchos y maíz.
texts.en:
This borrower is a responsible and hard-working person.  For that reason, her friends invited her to join Asociación Arariwa's "Las Natividades" community bank.

The borrower was born in the city of Huarocondo (in Anta province, Cusco department, Peru).  She is 34 years old, married, and has four children from her relationship who are 10, 8, 3 and 3 months.  They all live with her.

The borrower currently lives in the same city in which she was born and this is where she carries out her business.  She raises animals such as pigs and also prepares a traditional dish called 'chicharrón' (fried pork rinds).  She sells her food in Inquilapata market, in Anta province, during town fiestas and also in other markets.

Another business that this borrower is engaged in is buying and selling corn.  She has been in these businesses since she was 8 years old as she used to accompany her parents but, now that she is an adult, she has to look out for the well-being of her own family.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy pigs and corn.

loans.use: to buy pigs and corn

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
La señora Betty es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000 del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 56 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos (todos mayores D. edad).
Son cuatro años que viene trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta D. pescado seco, que los compra por el rio para luego venderlos en un almacén D. la ciudad, cuando tiene pedidos los lleva a su casa para vender a sus vecinos.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 4 sacos D. pescado.
Solo tiene un hijo a su cargo, su esposo es maestro jubilado y la acompaña en el nmegocio.
Manuela Ramos ha sabido direccionar a las socias en sus negocio y por eso están muy agradecidas.
texts.en:
Betty is a member of the "Mujeres del 2000" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 56 years old, married, and has four grown-up children.

Betty has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for four years.  Her business is selling dried fish.  She buys the fish by the river and then sells them in a store in the city.  When she has orders, she takes the fish home to sell to her neighbors.

Betty will use this new loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles to buy four sacks of fish.

Betty has only one child in her care.  Her husband is a retired teacher and he accompanies her in the business.

Manuela Ramos have known how to guiD. their borrowers in their businesses and they are very grateful for that.

loans.use: to buy dried fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine, underwear and plastic products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Oty Katty

texts.es:
La señora Oty es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Del 2000 del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Lleva muy poco tiempo como socia de Manuela Ramos, pero tiene todas las ganas de querer trabajar  y salir adelante por ese motivo ahora ha tenido la idea de poner una tienda de comestibles (bodega).

Con su nuevo préstamo S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 estante de madera, 2 mesas, 8 sillas, 2 docenas de escobas, 1 docena de recogedores, 3 paquetes de agua mineral, 2 paquetes de gaseosa.
Su esposo es de profesión administrador y es quien le da las pautas de cómo manejar su negocio.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo brindado.  Gracias a los préstamos ha podido hacer realidad uno de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Oty is a member of the 'Mujeres del 2000' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 23 years old, married, and has one child.  She has not been a member of Manuela Ramos for very long but she has a great desire to work and get ahead in life.  For this reason, she decided to set up a grocery store.

Oty will use her loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles to buy: 1 wooden shelf, 2 tables, 8 chairs, 2 dozen brooms, 1 dozen dustpans, 3 packets of mineral water and 2 packets of soda.

Oty's husband is an administrator by profession and he provides her with guidance on how to run her business.

Oty is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the support they have provided.  Thanks to their loans, she has been able to make one of her dreams come true.

loans.use: to buy a wooden shelf, tables, mineral water, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy four pigs

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Las Natividades” D. la Asociación Arariwa.
La socia nació en la ciudad D. Capi D. la provincia D. Paruro del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 54 años D. edad, ella está casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene seis hijos D. las cuales dos dependen D. ella y los demás son independientes.
  
Actualmente, la socia vive en la ciudad D. Huarocondo (Anta, Cusco, Perú) y donD. desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. Ella también tiene una pequeña tienda donD. venD. comestibles y venta D. chicha D. jora en su domicilio. Ella venD. chicharrón y caldos los días feriados y los dias domingos en la ciudad D. Huarocondo.

Ella lleva chicharrón dos veces a la semana a la ciudad D. Aguas Calientes (En la ciudad D. Aguas Calientes se encuentra la octava maravilla mundo Machupicchu) y venD. en el mercado D. la misma ciudad.

En esta oportunidad la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz y chanchos.
texts.en:
This borrower is a responsible and hard-working person.  For that reason, her friends invited her to join Asociación Arariwa's "Las Natividades" community bank.

The borrower was born in the city of Capi, in Paruro province, in Cusco department, Peru.  She is 54 years old, married, and has six children from her marriage.  Two of her children are still dependent upon her and the others live independently.

The borrower currently lives in the city of Huarocondo (Anta, Cusco, Peru) and this is where she carries out her business.  She has a small store in her home where she sells groceries and 'chicha D. jora' (a traditional, corn-based drink).  She also sells 'chicharrón' (fried pork rinds) and soups on public holidays and Sundays, in the city of Huarocondo.

Twice a week, she takes her 'chicharrón' to the city of Aguas Calientes (the city of Aguas Calientes is the home of the eighth wonder of the world - Machupicchu).

On this occasion, the borrower needs a loan to buy corn and pigs.

loans.use: to buy corn and pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: En Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "En camino al exito" porque que las integrantes trabajan arduamente dia con dia para llevar al exito sus negocios. El grupo está ubicado en el Estado de Hidalgo, está conformado por 9 integrantes. La señora Guadalupe es la tesorera del grupo. Tiene 30 años de edad, estudió hasta la secundaria y tiene una hija de 11 años. La señora se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos por catalogo desde hace 7 años, dado que el numero de clientas que atiende va en aumento necesita el préstamo para invertir en mercancia y asi poder atender la demanda de sus clietas. Quiere el prestamo para comprar cosmeticos ya que sus clientas la prefieren por que los pagos son flexibles y de muy buena calidad. Con las ganancias quiere ahorrar para la educacion de su hija ya que algun dia quiere verla con una carrera, tambien apoyar en los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called "En Camino al Éxito" (On the Path to Success) because its members work hard every day to achieve success in their businesses.  The group is located in the State of Hidalgo and has nine members.

Guadalupe is the group's treasurer.  She is 30 years old, studied up to high school level, and has an 11 year-old daughter.  She started her business selling cosmetics seven years ago.  As the number of customers she serves is increasing, she needs a loan to invest in merchandise, so that she can meet her customer demand.  She would like this loan to buy cosmetics.  Her customers are loyal to her business because the payments are flexible and her products are very good quality.  She would like to use the profits from her business to save up for her daughter's education as she would some day like to see her with a career.  She would also like to help cover her family expenses.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Las Natividades” D. la Asociación Arariwa.
La socia nació en la ciudad D. Anta D. la provincia D. Anta del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 49 años D. edad, ella está casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene cinco hijos D. las cuales uno depenD. D. ella y los demás ya son independientes.  

Actualmente, la socia vive en la ciudad D. Huarocondo (Anta, Cusco, Perú) y donD. desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. Ella se dedica a la crianza D. animales menores como por ejemplo chanchos y cuyes. Ella  en los días festivos se dedica a la preparación D. chicharrón y lechón (Estos platos típicos D. la zona se preparan con la carne D. chancho). Ella tiene una pequeña tienda D. abarrotes en su domicilio donD. venD. productos D. primera necesidad. Ya son 6 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes y chanchos.
texts.en:
This borrower is a responsible and hard-working person.  For that reason, her friends invited her to join Asociación Arariwa's "Las Natividades" community bank.

The borrower was born in the city of Anta, in Anta province, in Cusco department, Peru.  She is 49 years old, married, and has five children from her marriage.  One of her children is still dependent and the others live independently.

The borrower currently lives in the city of Huarocondo (Anta, Cusco, Peru) and this is where she carries out her business.  She raises animals such as pigs and guinea pigs.  On public holidays, she prepares 'chicharrón' (fried pork rinds) and suckling pig (these are typical regional dishes which are maD. from pork).  She also has a small grocery store in her home where she sells basic household products.  She has been in this business for six years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that she puts into it.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy guinea pigs and pigs.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es: El Señor Sotero tiene 50 años, él se dedica al destace de cerdo en su domicilio, negocio el cual es administrado por él personalmente. trabaja todos los días desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. Es una persona que ha trabajado toda la vida y gracias a su esfuerzo y constancia puede gozar de una vida tranquila pues siempre está pensando en el bienestar de su familia. Hace más de 11 años que se dedica a este negocio y fue por medio de lucha y sacrificio que ha logrado mantener su negocio. Este financiamiento es para la compra de cerdos y vacas y posteriormente realizar la venta de la carne.
texts.en:
Sotero is 50 years old.  He works butchering pigs in his home and runs this business himself.  He works every day, from 5.00am to 7.00pm.  Sotero is a person who has worked his entire life and, thanks to his effort and perseverance, he is able to enjoy a quiet life.  He is always thinking of his family's well-being.

Sotero has been in this business for more than 11 years and he has been able to keep it running thanks to his hard work and sacrifice.  He will use this loan to buy pigs and cows so that he can sell their meat.

loans.use: to buy pigs and cows

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es: La señora Florentina tiene 45 años de edad, es casada su esposo trabaja en la mina, y con los ingresos que genera ayuda en los gastos familiares, florentina tiene 7 hijos pero solo dos de ellos están en el colegio, florentina se dedica a vender golosinas por las zonas mas transitadas de la ciudad, viene realizando esta labor por mas de 4 años,el dinero que esta solicitando es para comprar un triciclo mas grande ya que el que tiene actualmente es demasiado pequeño,y con el dinero que le sobre comprar un poco mas de mercadería como gaseosas, galletas,chocolates, entre otros, florentina tiene muchos sueños uno de ellos es con el tiempo tener un kiosko o una bodega donde ofrecer sus productos, florentina esta muy agradecida con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Florentina is 45 years old and married.  Her husband works in a mine.  With the income that she makes, Florentina helps cover their family expenses.  She has seven children but only two of them are in school.  

Florentina's business is selling candies in the busiest areas of the city.  She has been in this business for more than four years.  She is requesting this loan to buy a larger three-wheeled cart since the one she has right now is too small.  With the money that she has left, she will buy a little more merchandise such as soda, cookies, chocolates, etc.

Florentina has many dreams.  One of them is, in the future, to open a kiosk or a grocery store where she can sell her products.  She is very grateful for the trust that is being placed in her.

loans.use: to purchase a tricycle as well as cookies, sodas, and chocolates

loans.name: Maritza Emerita

texts.es: Doña Maritza Emerita, tiene 49 años de edad, es casada, tiene cinco hijos, y vive en la Comunidad de la Venta Nueva a 37 km del departamento de Olancho. La madre de Doña Maritza no le pudo dar el estudio así que le enseño a ganarse la vida llevandola a trabajar con ella a un comedor propiedad de la familia. Cuando Doña Maritza tuvo edad para independizarse lo hizo siguiendo el ejemplo de su madre, pero desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de mercaderia. Un desafio que enfrenta es que la ventas han bajado y que las realiza de forma ambulante y las zonas que visita son de alto riesgo delincuencial. Su sueño es llegar a tener su propio local, para así no correr riesgo de que la asalten y para dedicarle mas tiempo a su familia. El prestamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar mas y variados productos como ser ropa y zapatos para damas y caballeros, y ropa de cama. Ha recibido tres prestamos de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Maritza Emerita is 49 years old, married, and has five children.  She lives in Venta Nueva community, 37km from Olancho department.  Maritza's mother couldn't send her to school so she taught her to earn a living by taking her to work with her in an eatery which belonged to the family.  When Maritza was old enough to start living independently, she followed her mother's example.  However, for 10 years now she has been selling merchandise.

One of the challenges Maritza faces is that her sales have decreased.  In addition, she makes her sales as an itinerant vendor and the areas she visits are high crime areas.  Her dream is to own her own store so that she no longer has to run the risk of people assaulting her and so that she can devote more time to her family.

Maritza needs the loan that she is requesting in order to buy more products and a greater variety of products such as men's and ladies' clothes and shoes, and bedclothes.  She has received three loans from FAMA and has made her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy clothes, bedclothes and shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Romulo

texts.en: Romulo is married and a father of five adult-age dependents. He is 59 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Romulo has been a farmer for 21 years. He plants and harvests banana to earn a living. He sells bananas at home and at the local open market every week. Romulo earns approximately PHP 4,750 per month from these activities. Romulo has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 from GDMPC to pay labor costs for soil plowing. Romulo has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Romulo hopes to expand his business and buy a hectare of land to be planted with bananas.

loans.use: To pay labor costs for plowing the soil

loans.name: Alba Lorena

texts.es: Alba Lorena tiene 4 hijos a su cargo, con mucho esfuerzo esta señora ha logrado tener su propio medio de vida. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado. Hace más de 21 años que tiene este negocio, es una persona muy responsable y se encuentra muy contenta de hablar con sus clientes pues todos los días se siente bendecida por tener los clientes que tiene en la actualidad. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de muchas vacas.
texts.en: Alba Lorena has four children in her care.  With a lot of effort, this lady has managed to create her own way of earning a living.  Her business is buying and selling cattle.  She has had this business for more than 21 years.  She is a very responsible person and is happy to talk to her customers as every day she feels blessed to have the customers that she currently has.  She is requesting this loan to buy a lot of cows.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Santos Virginia

texts.es: Doña Santos Virginia, tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene 5 hijos y junto a su familia vive en la Comunidad de San Ignacio. Desde muy joven empezó a trabajar en una empresa, pero luego se casó y con ello vino su primer hijo así que para cuidarlo decidió dejar de trabajar y quedarse en su casa, por lo que instaló una venta de abarroteria. Su negocio es algo pequeño pero con las ganancias que obtiene puede ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio hasta verlo convertido en un mini-super y porque no, en un supermercado. Su sueño es ver crecer a sus hijos y seguirlos apoyando con el estudio. Con el prestamo solicitado comprara productos de la canasta basica para asi ofrecerles a sus clientes mas y variados productos, su horario de atencion es de lunes a domingo desde las 6:00 am hasta tarde por la noche, y su esposo e hijos la ayudan a atenderla.
texts.en:
Santos Virginia is 42 years old, married, and has five children.  She lives with her family in San Ignacio community.  Santos started working for a company when she was very young.  However, she then got married and had her first child.  In order to care for him, she decided to stop working and stay at home.  She decided to set up a grocery store in her home.

The business is quite small but, with the profits she makes, she is able to help her husband with the family expenses.  Her goal is to grow her business until it becomes a mini-supermarket and, why not, even a supermarket.  Her dream is to see her her children grow up and continue supporting them in their studies.

Santos will use the loan that she has requested to buy basic household products so that she can offer her customers a greater variety of products.  She works from Monday to Sunday, from 6.00am until late at night.  Her husband and children help her to serve in the store.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Jovis

texts.en:
Jovis is 36 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and a mother of three school-aged children. Jovis owns and operates a carpentry shop. She has a cabinet-making business with her husband. They make cabinets from wood, wardrobes, dressers, and storage chests. She runs this type of business for over six years. She earns approximately PHP 5,000 per month from this business. Jovis has requested a loan of PHP 20,000 at GDMPC to purchase materials for cabinet making.

Jovis has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Jovis hopes to have a furniture stall in the town and gain more profit from this business.

loans.use: To purchase materials for cabinet making.

loans.name: Kenn

texts.en: Kenn is married with 1 child. He is 29 years old and lives in Oroquieta City. To earn a living, he has a motorcycle repair business, which he has been running for 5 years.  Each month, he earns approximately PHP 5,000.  Kenn has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase more equipment for his motorcycle repair business. He has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.

loans.use: to purchase more equipment for his motorcycle repair business

loans.name: Ellonor

texts.en:
Ellonor is 37 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and a mother of five school-aged children. Ellonor has a motorcycle transport service business. She provides passenger services in the local community. She has been engaged in this business for over three years with a monthly income of PHP 6,000 from these activities. She requested a loan of PHP 12,000 at GDMPC to purchase motorcycle tires and spare parts.
Ellonor has been a member of GDMPC for two years. Ellonor hopes to buy an additional motorcycle for transport.

loans.use: To purchase motorcycle tires and spare parts.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 41 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboangs del Sur, Philippines. She is married and a mother of three school-aged children. Marivic is a farmer. She works on the farm everyday to earn a living. Marivic plants and sells flowers like chrysanthymums, asters and anthuriums. She has been running her business for over 11 years with a monthly income of PHP 10,340 from this business. Marivic has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 at GDMPC to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

Marivic has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Marivic hopes to buy land for a flower plantation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to paint his locksmith carts and to buy welding equipment

loans.name: Engracia

texts.en: Engracia is married. She lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer, and grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Engracia has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase feed for her pigs. She has been a member of PMPC for 2 years.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs

loans.name: Cherilyn

texts.en:
Cherilyn is a dealer of herbal products that are highly nutritious and health-giving supplements. She is 39 years of age and married with two children. She lives in Carangan, Ozamis City. For additional income for the family, Cherilyn has been selling food supplements for five years, with a monthly income of PHP 10,000. Cherilyn decided to continue this business because it is in economic demand. She has requested a loan of PHP 25,000 from GDMPC to purchase natural food supplements to sell.

Cherilyn is a new member of GDMPC. In the future, Cherilyn hopes to have a food supplement shop in the city and continue her business worldwide.

loans.use: to purchase  natural food supplement medecine to sell

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
35-year-old Sally is a farmer working in the Philippines. She is married and a mother of three grown children. Sally plants rice and harvests palay to earn a living. She has been running this type of business for 16 years. She earns approximately PHP 21,000 every quarter in this business. Sally requested a loan of PHP 30,000 from GDMPC to pay for soil preparation for the coming planting season.

Sally has been a member of GDMPC for two years. Sally hopes to buy a one-hectare rice field for her business.

loans.use: To pay for soil preparation

loans.name: Mila

texts.en: Mila is married with 3 children. She is 61 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer, and grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Mila has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase feed for her pigs. She has been a member of PMPC for 4 years.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 33 years old, single, and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Hannah operates a retail shop at home. She has been engaged in selling basic food items to earn a living for three years. She sells assorted food product like biscuits, candies, chocolates and many others. She earns a total monthly average income of PHP 5,000 from this business. Hannah has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to purchase rice and corn grains to sell.

Hannah has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Hannah hopes to expand her business and gain more profit.

loans.use: to purchase rice and corn grains to sell.

loans.name: Glena

texts.en:
Glena is 35 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanbga del Sur. She is married and a mother of four grown children.

Glena has a small market at home to make a living. She sells basic food items, which is the secondary income for her family. She has been engaged in this type of business for over 10 years. She earns a total monthly average of PHP 5,000 from this activity. Glena requested a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to purchase additional stocks to sell. 

Glena has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Glena hopes to expand her business and gain more profit.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock to sell

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is 25 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married and a mother of two grown children.

Raquel has a clothing business. She has a small stall at the market where she sells ready-to-wear clothes to earn a living. She has been engaged in this type of business to generate an extra income of PHP 5,000 per month. Raquel uses her income for the family and for the education of her two children. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 from GDMPC to purchase additional stock of ready-to-wear clothes to sell.
